document.full_text: a swedish film about two teenage girls whose friendship turns to rivalry, and a documentary about people in a barren california former resort town won the top prizes at the tribeca film festival on thursday.
document.title: tribeca festival jury rewards first time directors
lines_and_colors: a swedish film about two teenage girls whose friendship turns to rivalry, and a documentary about people in a barren california former resort town won the top prizes at the tribeca film festival on thursday.
